title: Aashram
overview: A duplicitous, aashram based, Indian Godman's good deeds serve activities criminal and unholy, such as rapes, murders, drugs, vote bank politics and forced male emasculation. The law and a few crusaders investigate to bring him to account.

tv.episodeOverview: Pammi has decided to give up her career as a wrestler and follow the path of devotion and salvation under the guidance of Baba Nirala. She is highly impressed by the work Baba has done for the poor and the outcastes. Meanwhile the subinector Ujagar SIngh is probing the case of the skeleton. Will he find any lead in the case? All the episodes of the Hindi web show Ashram available on MX Player without signing up. Watch now!
